issue.title: [Gandiva] Use non-platform specific integer types for lengths, indexes
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-3333](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-3333). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
There are many instances of using `unsigned int` and `int` for array indexes. This may cause issues on Windows

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-3333?focusedCommentId=16709507) by Wes McKinney (wesm):*
This should be reviewed, but not necessary while Gandiva is in an Alpha / Beta stage
